items.title: Shirts
items.imageAlt: Order your Tiny Porch 2025 Shirt TODAY
items.description:
[Order your 2025 Tiny Porch shirt TODAY! ](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd0yMjLlP3AK9IQhNmQduiDSlwzNt15X8Ubp72sPFSrPZU_DQ/viewform)**Orders will close June 1st** and shirts will be available for pickup mid-June. 

There will only be ONE order of 2025 Tiny Porch Shirts this season -- don't miss out, [order today! ](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd0yMjLlP3AK9IQhNmQduiDSlwzNt15X8Ubp72sPFSrPZU_DQ/viewform)

HUGE thank you to StudioTwoThree for printing all of our 2025 shirts this summer. You all are amazing community advocates. 

[](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScjITxDYXZqrh84aSCpXl7j5Gpfun9V-yO6cef7_cceAHEe6A/viewform)

items.title: Koozies
items.description: Grab an official Tiny Porch Koozie over at the Free Little Library at 811 W. 29th St! Only $2 Each!
